Scorch.display_help: This power engulfs your hands in flames, and can ignite the target of your Scorching attack. Once on fire, the target will suffer damage over time. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage.

Fire_Sword.display_help: Through concentration, you can create a Sword of Fire that sets foes ablaze. Successful attacks from the Fire Sword will ignite your target, dealing damage over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Combustion.display_help: Your mastery of fire allows you to violently raise the temperature around yourself in an attempt to spontaneously combust any nearby foes and set them ablaze, dealing damage over time. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

Taunt.display_help: Taunts a foe, and some nearby foes, to attack you. Useful for pulling villains off an ally who find themselves in over their head. Taunted foes tend to ignore other Heroes and focus on you for quite a while, so use this power cautiously. A To Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Moderate

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Taunt {PlayerDest} to attack you.
Your {PowerName} hit, and you Taunt {PlayerDest} to attack you.
messages.display_victim_hit: {Playersource} hit you with their {Powername}. You have been Taunted!

messages.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} partially hit! {PlayerDest} is not taunted but their range is reduced!
messages.display_victim_hit: {Playersource} partially hits you with their Taunt! Your range is reduced but the Taunt is not successful!

Breath_of_Fire.display_help: This allows you to spew forth fire from your mouth, burning all foes within its narrow cone. This is a very accurate attack that can deal good damage at a close range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

messages.display_attacker_hit: You tap into your inner fire with your {PowerName} and are more accurate and more deadly for a short while.

Fire_Sword_Circle.display_help: Mastery of your Fire Sword has enabled you to make an attack on every foe within melee distance. This will slash and burn your enemies, dealing minor damage and setting them ablaze. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Incinerate.display_help: Intense concentration can allow you to Incinerate an opponent. This will set your foe ablaze, dealing damage over time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
